summary.overview: This JCL manages transaction type reference data by recreating a VSAM indexed file and loading current transaction type codes and descriptions from a sequential source file. The process ensures a clean, up-to-date transaction type lookup table is available for the card demonstration application.
business_functions: Delete existing transaction type reference file to ensure clean data setup
Create new indexed transaction type storage structure with efficient key-based access
Load current transaction type codes and descriptions from source file into indexed storage
Establish transaction type lookup capability for card processing operations

TRANTYPE.jcl.program_overview: IBM utility for VSAM dataset management operations including creation, deletion, and data loading

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Type Master File (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANTYPE.VSAM.KSDS)
datasource_summary.function: Stores master data for transaction types with indexed access capability for efficient retrieval and processing

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Type Data Component (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANTYPE.VSAM.KSDS.DATA)
datasource_summary.function: Physical storage component that contains the actual transaction type record data within the VSAM cluster

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Type Index Component (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANTYPE.VSAM.KSDS.INDEX)
datasource_summary.function: Index structure component that provides fast key-based access to transaction type records in the VSAM cluster

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Type Source Data (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANTYPE.PS)
datasource_summary.function: Contains source transaction type data in sequential format that serves as input for loading into the VSAM master file

flow_diagram_code:
